modName: Zephyr Dwarvenbow Arrows And Dwarven Black Bow
summary:
Zephyr, Unique Zephyr, Dwarvenbow, Dwarvenarrow & Dwarven Black Bow
Texture Overhaul
descriptionHtml:
[color=#999999][size=4]
[/size][font=Georgia][size=5]
                  Z e p h y r[/size]
[/font][/color][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][i][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=5]
                 [/size][/font][/color]"Here's where I fell. Feels like ages ago. [color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=5]
                  [/size][/font][/color]Hey! There's my bow! There, out on the log. [color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=5]
                  [/size][/font][/color]I'd wondered what happened to it.[color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=5]
                  [/size][/font][/color]Take good care of it for me."
[color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=5]
                  [/size][/font][/color]                                                             [size=5][size=3]K[/size][/size]atria




[color=#666666]Zephyr is a unique Dwarven bow found in the Dwemer Ruin of Arkngthamz during the
quest "Lost to the Ages." It previously belonged to Katria, an adventurer who died
in an earthquake while exploring the ruins.[/color][/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][i]
[/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#666666]

Main file I
[/color]
[color=#b6b6b6][size=4]01 Zephyr[/size][/color][color=#b6b6b6][size=4] & Dwarvenbow[/size][/color][/size][/font][/color][i][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3]

a texture overhaul[/size][/font][font=Georgia]
You need:  [/font][/color][/size][/font][/color][/i][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][i][font=Georgia][font=Georgia]Zephyr or Dwarvenbow[/font]
(See image 01-02)[/font]



[/i][color=#666666]Main file II[/color]
[i]
[/i][color=#b6b6b6][size=4]02 for Unique Zephyr[/size][/color][i][size=4]
[/size]
a texture overhaul[/i][/size][/font][size=3][i][font=Georgia]
You need:  [/font][/i][/size][/color][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][i][font=Georgia]Unique Zephyr [/font]the [color=#999999][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74677]original [/url]mod of  Nazenn
- Provides a unique mesh and texture for the Dawnguard weapon Zephyr.
(See image 01, 03-06)[/color]


[/i]
[/size][/font][/color][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#666666]Optional files[/color][/size][/font][/color][i][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3]
[i]
[/i][/size][/font][/color][/i][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#b6b6b6][size=4]03 Dwarvenarrow[/size][/color][/size][/font][/color][i][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][i][size=4]
[/size]
[/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia]a texture overhaul
[font=Georgia][font=Georgia]I recommend you:  Closer Quivers and Longer Arrows  by﻿ EvilDeadAsh34[/font][/font][/font][/color][/i][/size][/font][/color][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][i][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#999999][i][i]  (compatible)
[/i][/i][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3](See image 05-06)
[/size][/font][/color][/size][/font][/color][/size][/font][/color][/i][/size][/font][/color]

[color=#b6b6b6][size=4][font=Georgia][font=Georgia][font=Georgia][font=Georgia]04 [/font][/font][/font][/font][font=Georgia]Dwarven Black Bow[/font][/size][/color][i][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][i][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][i]

[/i]a texture overhaul  black - silver
V2[/size][/font][/color][/i][/size][/font][/color][/size][/font][/color][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3]: [/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3]reduced magenta glow effect
You need:  [/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3]Dwarven Black Bow
[/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][i][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][i][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3](no image find out)


[/size][/font][/color][/size][/font][/color][/size][/font][/color][/i][/size][/font][/color][/size][/font][/color][/i][/size][/font][/color][/size][/font][/color][/size][/font][/color][/i][i][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][font=Georgia][color=#666666][size=3][i][font=Georgia][size=3][font=Georgia][size=3][font=Georgia]The Dwarven Black Bow of Fate can be found inside Kagrumez, on a rack in the southeast room.
In order to find it, the Dragonborn must find the rest of the Kagrumez Resonance Gemsto unlock the gates preceding it,
by placing them in the matching order that is depicted on the gates into the center podium of the main room.
[/font][/size][/font][/size][/font][/i][/size][/color][/font][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][i][color=#999999][font=Georgia][size=3][color=#999999][i][size=3][i][size=3]

and copy it to your Skyrim / Data directory.
Overwrite the texture of the original.
Simple, for free . . .[/color]
